name: Memimo
overview:
Memimo was founded by Rocio Herrero in August 2009, as an exclusive promotion management software for leading brands.

At Memimo it is believed that technology should make transactions more transparent and simplify deals, and for that reason its software developers created an application capable of managing all kind of promotions and controlling the issuance, the target, visibility, and the cost.

The differentiating features that makes this company stand out among its competitors in a saturated market without differentiation are:

They only work with leading brands which ensures the quality of the service/product.

Charging the brand a fixed percentage of the sales profit only if the promotion campaign has been successful at its conclusion.

Attracting clients to the store or website. The users do not purchase from them. Memimo redirects users to shops where the purchase is executed.

Memimo not only tries to retain the loyalty of clients through the alert system that every user has access to, it also strengthen the brand social channels.

Memimo, an “all in one” leading edge technology for managing all marketing promotions.
